anchor_token_code_id.description: Anchor token code ID used to instantiate

base_denom.description: stable coin denom used to borrow & repay

interest_model.description: The contract has the calculation logics of Anchor borrow interest rate

owner_addr.description: overseer contract can be registered after we register market contract to overseer contract Owner address for config update

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
